channel.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
channel.description:
Well, i love this mod, i am praying every night before i go to sleep that it will be released and i needed a reason to upload the trailer on my channel, so... i made this.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gdLAJ84_xy8[/url]
I don't know how many romanian fans are out there, but i am sure i am not alone! :freeman:

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
TheRatMan:

It makes me laugh people who think that countries like Romania or Israel are people who live in mud huts or tents

Pff of course not. They live in clay huts. DUH.

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: TudorSuta
item.description:
ah, asa suna mai bine. ma gandeam eu ca ai vrut sa scrii euro. in fine, incearca sa nu-l mai bagi pe asta in seama pentru ca in parerea mea e unul din doua lucruri. unu ii prost, in ce caz e trist sau sau se preface ca-i prost in ce caz e si mai trist. in ce ani de liceu esti?

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
~11 mil, nu 6 mil. Am scris din greseala $ (in loc de E). Merg la liceu deci inca stau la parinti.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: TudorSuta
item.description:
GothicFighter:

No download cap, 7$ per month. And my PC is quite decent. My parent’s salary is about 200$ per month but sometimes… opportunities… arise and I’ve managed to get hold of some cash in a relatively short amount of cash. Also lots of allowances that I didn’t spent for months.

Ei? da cum te descurci cu 6 millione pe luna? ai plati gaz, curent, internet, chiria si gata sau dus banuti :[

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
You managed to get hold of some cash in a relatively short amount of cash? … Yeah… that makes perfect sense.

item.title: Black Mesa Trailer with Romanian subtitles
item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
Hazzmat:

Aren’t you guys like too poor to even have a computer let alone an internet connection?

No download cap, 7$ per month. And my PC is quite decent. My parent’s salary is about 200E per month but sometimes… opportunities… arise and I’ve managed to get hold of some cash in a relatively short amount of time. Also lots of allowances that I didn’t spent for months.

Read full topic
